NAT *L ELECTION RETIRES S^ONSG ID—FIRST Tl^IQISTOKY
For the first time in broadcast history, full national election returns over
a radio network will bo sponsored by an advertiser. The '^ual Broadcasting
Company says its election night service has been sold to.tne Curtis Publis
ing Company, over a 500-station hook-up. Cost to Curtis is estimated to be
approximately s/75,000.
